channel.title: Make it so i get random item
channel.description: Hi Guys im trying to add so when u use a key in a chest u get a random piece of something like armor but random if any one would help ill appreciate thanks

item.title: Make it so i get random item
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

make a useitem atobject thing and include

addItem(Item2.randomNAME(), 1);

then add this in item2.java

[code]public static int randomNAME[] = {};

public static int randomNAME()
{
	return NAME[(int)(Math.random()*NAME.length)];
}	[/code]

change EVERY “NAME”
post for more help

Read full topic
item.source: Make it so i get random item
